articles.title: Wyze Unveils a $20 Smartwatch That Controls Smart Home Devices, Tracks Health - PCMag
articles.description: The Wyze Watch ships in February, but pre-orders begin today. To achieve the low price, Wyze says it's sacrificing profit margins and forgoing features like GPS.
articles.content:
(Credit: Wyze)
Smart home tech maker Wyze is expanding into smartwatches with the Wyze Watch, which costs a mere $20 and is now up for pre-order.
